description: The REFERRAL_HIST table contains information on changes to referrals stored in system.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the change to the referral. For example, if the referral is changed twice, the first change will have a line value of 1, while the second change will have a line value of 2.

columns.name: CHANGE_DATE
columns.description: The date of the change to the referral.

columns.name: CHANGE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value indicating the type of referral change.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CHANGE_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the user who made the change to the referral.

columns.name: PREVIOUS_VALUE
columns.description: Some of the information on the referral is tracked when it changes. This stores the previous value of an item if it is tracked when it changes.

columns.name: CHANGE_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time of the change to the referral.

columns.name: AUTH_HX_EVENT_NO
columns.description: The event no of the authorization history

columns.name: AUTH_HX_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Referral audit trail item to store note Id

columns.name: CHANGE_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The authorization date and time as an instant in the local time zone

columns.name: NEW_RFL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
If the item being changed is Referral Status (I RFL 50), this item stores the new value for that item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Authorized


Open


Pending Review


Canceled


Denied


Closed


New Request


Incomplete

columns.name: NEW_PEND_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
If the item being changed is Reason Pending (I RFL 18003), this item stores the new value for that item. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: NEW_FIN_PROV_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
If the item being changed is Finland - Provision Status (I RFL 72124), this item stores the new value for that item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Completed


Issued


Patient Declined


Cancelled

columns.name: NEW_FIN_VALID_END_DATE
columns.description: If the item being changed is Finland - Validity End Date (I RFL 72115), this item stores the new value for that item.
